heading.title: What is the Company?
heading.content: The provision of modern solutions based on affordable, but highly available, cloud infrastructure.

contents.name: Security Operations
contents.description: With the help of cloud security, we Security Operations from the Internet, among other things, and can make filter decisions based on various factors.

contents.name: EProfessional Services
contents.description: Queries and communication with Company-Cloud Intelligence have no impact on the performance and effectiveness of our products and solutions.

contents.name: Data Intelligence
contents.description: Data protection is always a priority for us, which is why the data from Comapny-Intelligence is encrypted at runtime and is therefore not visible even to administrators.
